amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate changes and additional funding for the HOPE for Homeowners program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-3 to eliminate changes and additional funding for the HOPE for Homeowners program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachmann amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 282 (Roll no. 21).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Bachmann.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bachmann amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 282 (Roll no. 21).
